extension-point.name: plugins
extension-point.documentation:
The plugin system for the FileManager give the possibility to register extenstion that will be responsible for creating a document from a given mime-type. The plugin should implement the org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.filemanager.interfaces.Plugin interface.
The registration of a Plugin can be done like this :
text/plain
The filter tag is used to know what mime-types cab be used with the plugin.
